questions.quote: Nevertheless, Elaine. The House, of Peterman is in Disorder. First thing tomorrow morning I want to see you, Peggy, and, Susie right here, in my office.
But it's just a friendly game. Why do you have to be such a stickler?
I'm not stealing it.  They owe me ten dollars.  They stole from me.
Well, it doesn't sound like you completely thought this through.
Oh! So you were swimming in the pool, and you wanted some gum.
Well, uh.. it hurts when he swallows. Expecially when he drinks orange juice.  I mean, uh.. dog food.. juice.  What's worse - he has a nagging cough.  Yeah, that's it. That's it.
Kramer, I am so sick of you comin' in here and eatin' all my food. Now shut that door and get the hell out of here!
No. That's one for the ages. But I think they're gonna put Poppie away for a long long time.
I don't understand.. you were wearing the pants you were returning?
Oh come on. Have some compassion. Okay well I hope it's contagious
